channel.title: New to Runescape servers; looking for basic server starter
channel.description:
I've been lurking and going through threads and trying different downloads for about a week now, and I haven't found what I'm looking for.
I'm basically looking for a vanilla RS2007 server set-up, except I'm not even really interested in hosting a public server. It's just something I want to set up for myself and my roommates, just so we can play a game we used to enjoy when we were younger. Modern-day Runescape is completely foreign to me at this point and I'd rather not pay the Members' fee to play their so-called "Old School" game. Unfortunately, most of the tutorials seem to focus on public server hosting when I'd like to get it running locally before tinkering with anything else.
In looking through the forums here, I've found a lot of information on java development, which is handy, but I'm already a decent java programmer and I'm not planning on doing any incredibly complicated mods anyway. I've tried downloading a ton of the servers that are already on the forum, but I've either run into various errors (mind you, I'm not a stranger to java and I got past a lot of the simple java-compatibility ones) or have encountered dead links.
Apologies if this isn't in the right forum. It's a little difficult to figure out what's what, as an outsider to this community, and I'm just looking for somewhere to start.

item.title: New to Runescape servers; looking for basic server starter
item.dc:creator: @Kamran1 Kamran1
item.description:
@Kamran1 wrote:

ownerbasgar:

kamran what run i need to use…

Download and install eclipse, load file directories to eclipse, run it in eclipse

Read full topic

item.title: New to Runescape servers; looking for basic server starter
item.dc:creator: @Kamran1 Kamran1
item.description:
@Kamran1 wrote:

Most sources have hardly any quests, you must script them in, but SAS has a base quest for you which is dragon slayer

item.source: New to Runescape servers; looking for basic server starter

item.title: New to Runescape servers; looking for basic server starter
item.dc:creator: @Schaichopath Schaichopath
item.description:
@Schaichopath wrote:

Thanks, both of you! I’ll start working with those and see if I can make some headway.

As an aside, a lot of the downloads I’ve looked through specifically note which quests are included; am I to assume that every quest has to be written from scratch or something? I figured they’d usually be included with wherever the source originally came from.

Read full topic
item.source: New to Runescape servers; looking for basic server starter

item.title: New to Runescape servers; looking for basic server starter
item.dc:creator: @Kamran1 Kamran1
item.description:
@Kamran1 wrote:

To be honest I’d start off with SAS -

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


Since your doing 2007 you may need to change a few things, sprites etc.

Read full topic
